code: import axios from'axios';var url='http://localhost:5000/lists';export var fetchLists=function fetchLists(){return axios.get(url);};export var createList=function createList(newList){return axios.post(url,newList);};export var updateList=function updateList(id,updatedList){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),updatedList);};export var deleteList=function deleteList(id){return axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));};
